layer.origins.dragonborn.name: Draconic Ancestry
layer.origins.dwarf.name: Dwarven Lineage
layer.origins.elf.name: Elven Lineage
layer.origins.gnome.name: Gnomic Descendance
layer.origins.halfling.name: Halfling Descendance
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn.descr: Born of dragons, as their name proclaims, the dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/black: Black dragonborns are descendants of the ancient black dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
Blue dragonborns are descendants of the ancient blue dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/brass: Brass dragonborns are descendants of the ancient brass dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/green: Green dragonborns are descendants of the ancient green dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/red.d: Red dragonborns are descendants of the ancient red dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/white: White dragonborns are descendants of the ancient white dragons, and as such some of their ancestor's abilities manifest in them.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dwarf.descriptio: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dwarf/hill.name: Hill Dwarf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dwarf/hill.descr: As a hill dwarf, you have keen senses, deep intuition, and remarkable resilience.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.dwarf/mountain.d: As a mountain dwarf, you’re strong and hardy, accustomed to a difficult life in rugged terrain.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf.name: Elf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/dark.name: Dark Elf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/dark.descrip: Also called dark elves, the Drow have skin that resembles charcoal or obsidian, as well as stark white or pale yellow hair.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/high.name: High Elf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/high.descrip: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/wood.name: Wood Elf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/wood.descrip: As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through your native forests.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome.name: Gnome
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome.descriptio: A gnome’s energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of their tiny body.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome/deep.name: Deep Gnome
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome/deep.descr: Guarded, and suspicious of outsiders, svirfneblin are cunning and taciturn, but can be just as kind-hearted, loyal, and compassionate as their surface cousins.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome/forest.des: Forest gnomes tend to be friendly with other good-spirited woodland folk, and they regard elves and good fey as their most important allies.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome/rock.name: Rock Gnome
origin.digs_dnd_origins.gnome/rock.descr: As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.half-elf.name: Half-Elf
origin.digs_dnd_origins.half-elf.descrip: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither, half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf an human parents: human curiosity, inventiveness, and ambition tempered by the refined senses, love of nature, and artistic tastes of the elves.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.half-orc.name: Half-Orc
origin.digs_dnd_origins.half-orc.descrip: Half-orcs’ grayish pigmentation, sloping foreheads, jutting jaws, prominent teeth, and towering builds make their orcish heritage plain for all to see.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.halfling.name: Halfling
origin.digs_dnd_origins.halfling.descrip: The comforts of home are the goals of most halflings’ lives: a place to settle in peace and quiet, far from marauding monsters and clashing armies; a blazing fire and a generous meal; fine drink and fine conversation.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.halfling/lightfo: As a lightfoot halfling, you can easily hide from notice, even using other people as cover.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.halfling/stout.d: As a stout halfling, you’re hardier than average and have some resistance to poison.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.tiefling.name: Tiefling
origin.digs_dnd_origins.tiefling.descrip: Tieflings are derived from human bloodlines, and in the broadest possible sense, they still look human. However, their infernal heritage has left a clear imprint on their appearance.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.variant_human.de: With their penchant for migration and conquest, humans are more physically diverse than other common races.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/cantrips/fir: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. On a hit, the target takes 3 fire damage. Any target hit by this spell ignites and continues to burn for 2 fire ticks.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/cantrips/lig: You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature you're aiming at. On a hit, the target takes 4 lightning damage and is stunned for half a second.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/cantrips/poi: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. On a hit, the target takes 4 withering damage and is poisoned for 3 seconds.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.elf/cantrips/ray: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/charger.de: While you are sprinting, you can choose to either shove or deal extra damage to a creature. If you hit a target while your hand is empty, you have significantly more knockback, but if you hit the creature with a weapon you will gain +4 to the damage you deal. This ability has a 6 second cooldown and you cannot sprint in that time.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/heavily_ar: You have trained to master the use of heavy armor. You gain proficiency with heavy armor, giving you +2 to your armor toughness while a full set of diamond or stronger is equipped. You are 10% slower while benefiting from this effect.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/lightly_ar: You have trained to master the use of light armor. You gain proficiency with light armor, giving you +2 to your armor toughness while a full set of chainmail or lighter is equipped. You are 5% slower while benefiting from this effect.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/mobile.des: Your speed increases by 20% but your exhaustion increases by 30%.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/moderately: You have trained to master the use of medium armor. You gain proficiency with medium armor, giving you +2 to your armor toughness while a full set of armor heavier than chainmail but lighter than diamond is equipped. You are 7% slower while benefiting from this effect.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/sentinel.d: When you hit a creature who is facing away from you, either for running away or attacking an ally, the target will be stunned for 6 seconds. This ability has a 6 second cooldown and does not work on other sentinels. You take 50% increased damage from projectiles.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/skilled.de: You gain proficiency in three additional skills of your choice, but all skills will be half as effective. You will choose your skills upon selecting this feat.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/skulker.de: You are expert at slinking through shadows. Sneaking while in light level 7 or less will render you (but not your armor) invisible. Sky light level is taken into account for this feat.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/tough.name: Tough
origin.digs_dnd_origins.feats/tough.desc: Your health point maximum increases by 20%, but your ranged attack damage is reduced by 30%.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.skills/animal_ha: You deal no damage to animals tamed by you.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.skills/athletics: You deal and resist 10% more knockback.
All healing for you is increased by 20%.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.skills/nature.de: When using bonemeal on crops, the bonemeal effect is applied twice.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.skills/sleight_o: Most of your interactions do not trigger sculk sensors.
origin.digs_dnd_origins.skills/stealth.d: Most of your movements do not trigger sculk sensors.
You gain an additional hunger bar for each item you eat.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/abilit: Due to your increased strength, you deal 1 extra melee damage.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/breath: You can breathe out before you in a line or cone depending on your subrace, damaging your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/damage: You are resistant to the element of your subrace. The damage taken or effect time is halved, depending on the element.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/habita: Whenever you are in a biome opposite of your subrace's natural habitat you will be slowed and weakened.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/size.d: You are larger than a human, your size is medium.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/subrac: Once you select this race you will select a subrace. Your subrace will determine your dragonborn color and element.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/black/: You can breathe out poison before you in a line, poisoning your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
Poisons last half as long for you.
Whenever you are in a dry biome you will be slowed and weakened.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/blue/a: Whenever you are in a humid biome you will be slowed and weakened.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/blue/b: You can breathe out lightning before you in a line, damaging and slowing your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/blue/d: You take half damage from lightning and slowness lasts half as long on you.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/brass/: Whenever you are in a humid biome you will be slowed and weakened.
You can breathe out flames before you in a line, burning your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
You take half damage from fire damage.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/green/: You can breathe out poison before you in a small cone, poisoning your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
Poisons last half as long for you.
Whenever you are in a dry biome you will be slowed and weakened.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/red/br: You can breathe out flames before you in a small cone, burning your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/red/da: You take half damage from fire damage.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/red/mo: Whenever you are in a cold biome you will be slowed and weakened.
power.digs_dnd_origins.dragonborn/white/: Whenever you are in a hot biome you will be slowed and weakened.
You can breathe out frost before you in a small cone, damaging and slowing your enemies. You regain the ability to do so after a short or long rest.
You take half damage from freezing and slowness lasts half as long on you.
